/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC  -D_FORCE_INLINES -fopenmp -O3 -DNDEBUG  -shared  -o libcuspy.so CMakeFiles/cuspy.dir/cuspy_generated_init.cu.o  -L/home/szf/torch/install/lib /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so -lluaT -lTHC /home/szf/torch/install/lib/libTH.so.0 /opt/OpenBLAS/lib/libopenblas.so -lrt -lm -Wl,-rpath,/home/szf/torch/install/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib64:/opt/OpenBLAS/lib:::::::::::::::
